activities.content: **Research Agent** completed competitive analysis on Meridian Corp's new pricing model. Key finding: they're undercutting by 15% but losing on feature depth. Full report saved to Documents.
**Email Triage** completed â€” 12 emails processed. 2 flagged urgent (investor update request from Sequoia, partnership inquiry from Stripe). 6 categorized FYI, 4 promotional archived.
**Task Updated** â€” "Finalize Series B deck" moved to In Progress. Due date: Feb 28. Assigned to Alex.
**Weekly Digest Report** generated. Revenue up 12% WoW, NPS at 72, churn decreased to 2.1%. Report available in Documents section.
**Main Agent** prepared meeting briefs for today's 3 meetings. Research on attendees completed. Key talking points generated.
**Health Sync** â€” Oura Ring data updated. Sleep score: 85 (good). Readiness: 78. Suggestion: schedule deep work in the morning while energy is highest.
**Social Media Agent** scheduled 3 LinkedIn posts for the week. Drafted thought leadership piece on AI in venture capital. Engagement up 23% from last week.
**Call Analysis** completed for NovaTech discovery call. Sandler score: 78/100. Key takeaway: strong pain identified in data pipeline management. Follow-up scheduled.
**CRM Updated** â€” Helios deal moved to Negotiation stage. Deal value: $450K. Decision maker confirmed as CTO Sarah Kim.
**Security Scan** completed. 0 critical issues. 1 warning: API key rotation recommended for staging environment. 5 info-level items logged.
**Travel Agent** finalized Tokyo trip itinerary. Flights booked (SFOâ†’NRT), hotel confirmed at Aman Tokyo. Weather forecast added.
**Reading List** updated â€” Added "The Hard Thing About Hard Things" per board member recommendation. 2 articles queued from Stratechery.
**Intel Alert** â€” Competitor Zenith Labs announced $30M Series C. Implications analyzed: likely expanding into enterprise segment. Recommended defensive positioning drafted.
**Outreach Agent** drafted 3 personalized outreach emails for target accounts. Using insights from recent conference attendee list. Ready for review.
**Pipeline Review** â€” 5 active deals totaling $2.4M. 2 expected to close this quarter. Win rate trending at 34%, up from 28% last quarter.
**Task Automation** â€” 4 recurring tasks auto-created for the week: investor update, team standup prep, metrics review, content calendar review.
**Morning Brief** delivered. 3 meetings today, 7 tasks in progress, 2 urgent emails. Tokyo trip in 6 days. Weather: 52Â°F, partly cloudy in San Francisco.
